text: If there were no schools to take the children away from home part of the time, the insane asylums would be filled with mothers.
author: E. W. Howe

text: I sing seriously to my mom on the phone. To put her to sleep, I have to sing 'Maria' from West Side Story. When I hear her snoring, I hang up.
author: Adam Sandler

text: My mother was a personal friend of God's. They had ongoing conversations.
author: Della Reese

text: I am no mother, and I won't be one.
author: Brigitte Bardot

text: Of all the roles I've played, none has been as fulfilling as being a mother.
author: Annette Funicello
